document_data.name: Alan
document_data.mainbody:
'''Alan''' was one of the inhabitants of [[Daggerford]] who died and was buried long before [[1372 DR]].

{{quote|''This adventure will be the death of me!''|Alan' headstone}}
document_data.History: Presumably Alan's last adventure was the cause of his death. He was buried in the [[Daggerford Graveyard]] just a couple of hours outside of the city walls, in the [[Eastern Farmlands]]. His grave was topped with a monument of a bigger size than the most in the south-eastern corner of the gated land a stone's throw away from a stream that eventually joined [[Delimbiyr River]]. By 1372 DR, Alan's grave marker was still in good condition with the engravings clearly readable.
